_comment: This file is used to provide custom strings for translations, including overriding defaults

pages-strings.titleExcellenceBlock|no description give: IT Excellence at the Service of Business Performance
pages-strings.subTitleExcellenceBlock|no description g: Our documentation is at your disposal to help you through all the steps from installation to configuration, updates and much more!
pages-strings.contentPrerequisiteBlock2ndPart|no descr: and the installation (CPU resources, memory, disks, partitioning, etc ...) and make sure you choose the right architecture for your needs before installing the platform.
pages-strings.contentInstallationBlock1stPart|no descr: The monitoring platform can be installed in several ways, however, we strongly recommend that you use Centreon Iso (ex CES) to
pages-strings.contentMonitoringBlock|no description gi: More than 400 IT domains already covered: networks, servers, applications, storage, databases, devices, hardware, etc. on physical, virtuekkes, or hybrid infrastructures.
pages-strings.contentHeartOpenSourceBlock|no descripti: Praised by hundreds of thousands of IT professionals around the world with 6,000 monthly downloads, Centreon has become the number 1 in open source monitoring in Europe.
pages-strings.btnOpenSource|no description given: contribute to the Open Source project
